segments.text: I see the water just pouring out of the sink, and the woman doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already wet, but she’s still polishing that plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how reckless he’s being, all for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re all going to regret this soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading everywhere, and the floor is going to be slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her task that she’s missing everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll even notice when the stool finally tips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a mess in every way.
segments.speaker: PAR
